ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B Electric Field and Waves Suite (EFW) Burst Waveform VB2 High Resolution Electric Potential in Spacecraft Spin (UVW) Coordinates and Instrument Status, Level 1 (L1), 0.06 ms Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, updated InformationURL URLs as needed, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220818

ResourceHeader.Description: The EFW Burst Modes provide targeted Measurements over Brief Time Intervals of 3-D Electric Fields, 3-D Wave Magnetic Fields, and Spacecraft Potential. There are two EFW Burst Modes: BURST1, B1, Medium-Rate 512 samples/s nominal and BURST2, B2, Higher-Rate, 16384 samples/s nominal. The Burst 1 Mode Data includes three components of the Electric Field, E12_B1, E34_B1, and E56_B1, six Components of the Spacecraft Sensor Potential, V1_B1 through V6_B1, and three Components of the AC Magnetic Field, SCM_U_B1, SCM_V_B1, and SCM_W_B1, from the EMFISIS Search Coil Magnetometer. The Burst 2 Mode Data returns a similar Complement of Electric Field, E_12ac_B2, E34ac_B2, and E56ac_B2, Search Coil, SCM_B2, SCM_2B2, and SCM_B2, again from the EMFISIS Search Coil Magnetometer and Single-ended Potential Measurements, V1ac_B1 through V6ac_B2, with the exception that in the Default Mode the Single-ended Potential and Electric Field Signals are AC coupled with a higher Gain. All Quantities are in UVW Coordinates where, U, and, V, are the Sensor Coordinates rotating with the Spacecraft and, W, points along the Spacecraft Spin Axis. Burst Waveform CDF Files are available. The three Data Types available are the Electric Field, E, the Searchcoil Magnetic Field, MSC, and Antenna Potential, V. The Suffix on each of these is either, B1 or B2. B1 or Burst 1 is the Human-in-the-Loop Burst Type, meaning that both Collection and Playback for arbitrary Lengths of Time are requested on the Ground. B2 or Burst 2 is automatically telemetered as short Bursts based on an onboard Triggering Algorithm, typically set to trigger on large Amplitude Signals near 1 kHz. Sample Rates for B1 and B2 can and are changed depending on varying Science Goals.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge J.R. Wygant, University of Minnesota, for providing the data. Open Data for Scientific Use.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time, UTC
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time, Coordinated Universal Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: VB2 Potential Voltages, V1 to V6, ±X, ±Y, ±Z Sensors, ADC Units
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, Potential Voltages, V1 to V6, ±X, ±Y, ±Z Sensors, Raw ADC Units

Parameter.Name: VB2 V1 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V1 or +X Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V1 or +X Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: VB2 V2 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V2 or -X Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V2 or -X Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: VB2 V3 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V3 or +Y Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V3 or +Y Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: VB2 V4 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V4 or -Y Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V4 or -Y Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: VB2 V5 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V5 or +Z Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V5 or +Z Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: VB2 V6 Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: VB2 Mode, V6 or -Z Component Voltage Potential Sensor Enabled Flag
Parameter.Caveats: VB2 Mode, V2 or -Z Component Flag: 0=Disabled, 1=Enabled

Parameter.Name: GDH Size
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Generic Data Header, GDH, Size
Parameter.Caveats: Size of Object to follow in Bytes, including this Header

Parameter.Name: GDH Type
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Generic Data Header, GDH, Type
Parameter.Caveats: Type of Object to follow: 0=EOT, 3=PTP, 255=Error Message

Parameter.Name: GA Spacecraft Identifier
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Spacecraft Identifier
Parameter.Caveats: Spacecraft ID: 0x16A=RBSP-A, 0x16B=RBSP-B

Parameter.Name: GA GRT Epoch Day
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Ground Receipt Time, GRT, Epoch Day, Days since January 1, 1958
Parameter.Caveats: Days since January 1, 1958

Parameter.Name: GA GRT Milliseconds of Day
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Ground Receipt Time, GRT, Milliseconds of Day

Parameter.Name: GA GRT Tenths of Microseconds since the Millisecond
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Ground Reciept Time, GRT, Tenths of Microseconds since the Millisecond

Parameter.Name: GA Source
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Source
Parameter.Caveats: 6=Spacecraft from SSR, 7=Spacecraft in Real-Time, 100=Ground System, 200=Testbed

Parameter.Name: GA Path
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ground Annotation, GA, Path, Front-End or Ground Station Identifier
Parameter.Caveats: Front-End or Ground Station Identifier: 0=Ground System, 1=Front End #1, 2=Front End #2, 3=Front End #3, 4=Front End #4, 5=Front End #5, 6=Front End #6, 7=Front End #7, 255=Not Applicable or Unknown

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Version, always Zero
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Version, always Zero

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Type
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: CCSDS Header Type: 0=Telemetry, TLM, 1=Command, CMD
Parameter.Caveats: CCSDS Header Type: 0=Telemetry, TLM, 1=Command, CMD

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Secondary Header Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Secondary Header Flag
Parameter.Caveats: CCSDS Secondary Header Flag: 0=No Secondary Header, 1=Secondary Header Present

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header APID
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Application ID, APID

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Grouping
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Grouping
Parameter.Caveats: CCSDS Header Grouping Flag: 0=Intermediate Packet, 1=First Packet in Group, 2=Last Packet in Group, 3=Not Part of Group

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Sequence Count
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Sequence Count
Parameter.Caveats: The CCSDS Header Sequence Count increments with each Packet

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header Packet Length
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Packet Length
Parameter.Caveats: The CCSDS Header Packet Length lists the Number of Bytes following the Packet Length minus One. The Value is always an odd Number

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Header MET
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Header Mission Elapsed Time, MET

Parameter.Name: Packet Sample Index
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Packet Sample Index, Index of the first Sample from this Packet

Parameter.Name: Header Epoch Time, UTC
Parameter.Description: Header Epoch Time, Coordinated Universal Time, UTC
Parameter.Caveats: Time Base for the Packet Header Data This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Data Subseconds
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Data Subseconds
Parameter.Caveats: Divide by 65536, 2, #185; #8310;, to get the Mantissa Part of the Mission Elapsed Time for this Packet

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Data Compression Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Data Compression Flag, 0=Off, 1=On
Parameter.Caveats: CCSDS Data Compression Flag: 0=Off, 1=On

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Data BEB Configuration Bits
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Data Boom Electronics Board, BEB, Configuration Bits
Parameter.Caveats: See a to be determined, TBD, Document for the Modes designated by these seven Bits

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Data DFB Configuration Bits
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Data Digital Fields Board, DFB, Configuration BitSee a to be determined, TBD, Document for the Modes designated by these eight Bits

Parameter.Name: CCSDS Data Speed Code
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: HDR_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Consultative Committee for Space Data Systems CDF Common Data Format, CCSDS, Data Speed Code
Parameter.Caveats: See a to be determined, TBD, Document for the Speed Setting designated by this Code
